actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to provide for the deportation of certain nonimmigrant aliens involved in unlawful conduct in demonstrations and for the expediting of judicial review of deportation and exclusion orders.

summary.text: Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to provide that a nonimmigrant alien who has been arrested for any unlawful conduct in connection with a demonstration shall be subject to immediate deportation as having failed to maintain a nonimmigrant status. Reduces from six months to 30 days the period during which a petition for review of a deportation order must be filed.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to provide for the deportation of certain nonimmigrant aliens involved in unlawful conduct in demonstrations and for the expediting of judicial review of deportation and exclusion orders.
